name: The Sacrifice (etSierraGames)
description:
My submission created for the GDL August Game Jam

-----------------------------

Controls:

WASD: Movement

LMB: Used to interact with villagers, and the world

RMB: Orbit

Scrollwheel: Zoom

-------------------------

You must attract as many villagers as you can, while keeping balance sacrificing villagers to the gods. 

Your time runs out when your ruin score reaches 10

Sacrifice villagers by clicking on them, and sending them to their fate

--------------------------

This was a solo dev project and my first Jam

Although I did not complete the game I sought out to complete, I'm still very proud of what I was able to accomplish in a short amount of time.

Thank you for playing and rating.

Assets used:

music: https://soundimage.org/looping-music/

cave model: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-rock-cave-7923065c6e5449dc8cdc5dd2ae653...
